author: Casey Tolan, Curt Devine, Daniel A. Medina
title: US lobbying firms rush to cut ties with Russian businesses hit with sanctions
description: In the years leading up to Russia's attack on Ukraine, US lobbyists have raked in millions of dollars from Russian banks and financial firms paying to push their interests in Washington.
content:
